parameters.name: UserGroupId
parameters.description: User-defined ID of a command group

parameters.name: UserIDs
parameters.description: Array of command IDs for the given command group

title: ICommandManager.GetGroupDataFromRegistry
description: Gets the command IDs of the given command group from the registry.
signature:
System.Boolean GetGroupDataFromRegistry( 
   System.Int32
UserGroupId
,
   out System.Object
UserIDs
)

parameters.name: UserGroupId
parameters.description: User-defined ID of a command group

parameters.name: UserIDs
parameters.description: Array of command IDs for the given command group

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
Call this API before calling
ICommandManager::CreateCommandGroup2
. The array of command IDs returned by this method helps you decide how to set the IgnorePreviousVersion parameter of ICommandManager::CreateCommandGroup2.
